items.title: With 'Baby Botox,' young adults strive to keep wrinkles from ever forming
items.description: A growing number of 20-somethings are trying to freeze time with preventative Botox treatments. Here's what's behind the trend.

items.title: Alaska owns dozens of crumbling schools. It wants underfunded districts to take them on
items.description: Rural school district superintendents are trying to find the best use of limited resources. Taking on the state's unmaintained buildings, they say, wi...

items.title: Disaster and insurance costs are rising. The middle class is struggling to hang on
items.description: Middle-class families are struggling to afford insurance in southwest Florida. Realtors say a wave of foreclosures could be coming.

items.title: More women are renting dresses, coats and ugly sweaters as clothing prices tick up
items.description: More women are planning to deck the halls in rented fashion this year, just as inflation and tariffs are poised to push clothing prices higher.

items.title: She lost her purse — but strangers stepped in to save the day
items.description: On a trip to Chicago, Lavonne Schaafsma lost her purse. Two women saw a man rifling through it — and stepped in to help.
